title: [Epidemiology] Researchers find ultraviolet light could be a simple and inexpensive way to slow the airborne spread of COVID-19 at close distances by inactivating the virus, reducing the risk of contamination by up to 50% when respiratory droplets are irradiated

[Medicine] A new SARS-CoV-2 vaccine candidate, developed by giving a key proteinâ€™s gene a ride into the body while encased in a measles vaccine, has been shown to produce a strong immune response and prevent SARS-CoV-2 infection and lung disease in multiple animal studies
